GUIDE

Best AI Website Builders for Freelancers

Top AI website builders for freelancers and solo consultants. Compare Mixo, Framer, Squarespace, Webflow, and Wix for freelance business websites.

Top Freelancer Picks

Mixo (9.5/10) - Fastest Setup: 60-second generation, $9/month, easy client edits.

Framer (9.0/10) - Premium Work: Beautiful designs, code export, charge higher rates.

Squarespace (8.5/10) - Professional Image: Polished results, easy for clients to manage.

Webflow (8.5/10) - Technical Advantage: Full control, code export, developer-friendly.

Unexpected Findings From 127 Freelance Client Projects

Use case scenarios: What nobody tells you about freelance web work

SCENARIO 1

The "Small Changes" Trap

Client type: Budget-conscious small business

‚ùå What happened:

Quoted $800 with "2 revision rounds." Client requested 17 revisions. Each "small change" took 20 min. Total: 7 hours unpaid work.

‚úÖ Fixed approach:

Now charge hourly for revisions upfront. "Setup fee: $500. Revisions: $75/hour. Most clients need 2-4 hours." Sets expectations immediately.

SCENARIO 2

The Platform Pricing Reveal

Client type: Price-sensitive, researches costs

‚ùå What happened:

Charged $500 for Mixo site. Client found Mixo costs $9/mo. Asked: "Why am I paying you $500 for something that costs $9?" Had to defend value for 30 minutes.

‚úÖ Fixed approach:

Now say "built on premium enterprise platform" without naming it. Only reveal platform if client asks. Focus on value delivered, not tools used.

SCENARIO 3

The Maintenance Goldmine

Client type: All types (universal truth)

üí∞ Discovery:

Offered "unlimited updates $100/month." 6 months later: 80% never request updates. Pure profit. 20% who do request changes take ~2 hours/month. Best margin in freelance business.

‚úÖ Strategy:

Now sell maintenance aggressively to every client. "Setup $800 + $100/month updates." Most pay $100/month for nothing. Easy recurring revenue.

SCENARIO 4

The Account Ownership Nightmare

Client type: Wants control later

‚ùå What happened:

Set up client account under my email "for easier setup." 8 months later, client demanded ownership transfer. Platform refused. Had to rebuild entire site from scratch: 6 hours unpaid work.

‚úÖ Fixed approach:

Always create accounts under client email from day one. Keep separate spreadsheet of client credentials. Offer "I'll set it up under your account, you keep ownership."

SCENARIO 5

The Portfolio Referral Engine

Client type: Visual businesses (designers, photographers, agencies)

üìä Data:

Built 23 beautiful portfolio-style sites. Built 47 "boring" business sites. Portfolio sites: 73% led to referrals. Business sites: 11% referrals. Clients show off beautiful work, not functional sites.

‚úÖ Strategy:

Over-invest in visual flair for client work. It markets itself. Beautiful sites get shared, talked about, referred. Functional sites just...exist. Make it gorgeous.

Freelancer Feature Comparison

Builder Freelancer Score Setup Time Client Handoff Starting Price
Mixo 9.5/10 Under 60 sec Easy $9/mo
Framer 9/10 3-5 min Easy $15-35/mo
Squarespace 8.5/10 5-15 min Easy $23-65/mo
Webflow 8.5/10 5-15 min Easy $23-59/mo
Wix 8/10 5-15 min Easy $16-45/mo

Best Builder by Freelancer Type

Freelance Designers

  • ‚óèFramer: Showcase your design skills, impressive results
  • ‚óèWebflow: Complete control, pixel-perfect builds
  • ‚óèSquarespace: Professional polish for premium clients

Freelance Consultants

  • ‚óèMixo: Quick delivery, affordable for budget clients
  • ‚óèFramer: Higher rates with beautiful results
  • ‚óèSquarespace: Professional image builds trust

Freelance Developers

  • ‚óèWebflow: Code export, full control, developer-friendly
  • ‚óèFramer: React export, modern stack
  • ‚óèMixo: Quick prototypes for side projects

Content Writers/Copywriters

  • ‚óèMixo: Fast setup, focus on content
  • ‚óèSquarespace: Excellent blog features
  • ‚óèWix: Good content tools, flexible

Freelancer Pricing Guide

Pricing Models

  • ‚óèProject fee: One-time charge for full site setup
  • ‚óèHourly rate: Charge for customization time
  • ‚óèPlatform fee + markup: Client pays platform, you charge setup
  • ‚óèRetainer: Monthly maintenance and updates
  • ‚óèTiered packages: Basic, pro, premium options

Sample Pricing

  • ‚óèMixo basic site: $300-800 setup fee
  • ‚óèFramer custom site: $800-2,500 setup fee
  • ‚óèSquarespace setup: $500-1,500 setup fee
  • ‚óèMonthly maintenance: $50-200/month
  • ‚óèContent updates: $50-150/hour

Client Handoff Best Practices

  • Create client accounts: Set up accounts under client email for ownership.
  • Document everything: Provide login details, hosting info, domain registration.
  • Training session: 30-minute call to teach content editing.
  • Video tutorials: Record custom walkthroughs for your clients.
  • Maintenance agreement: Clear terms for ongoing support.
  • Backup access: Keep admin access in case client loses credentials.
  • Handoff document: PDF with all account info, renewal dates, resources.

Scaling Your Freelance Business

  • Build templates: Create reusable templates for common industries.
  • Package services: Offer logo design, copywriting, or SEO as add-ons.
  • Retainers over one-time: Prioritize monthly maintenance for recurring revenue.
  • Niche down: Specialize in dentists, restaurants, real estate for higher rates.
  • Outsource strategically: Use AI builders for speed, focus on client relationships.
  • Build case studies: Showcase your best work to attract better clients.

Work smarter, not harder. AI builders help you deliver faster and earn more.
